name: Birds Game for Toddlers Puzzle
description:
Does your toddler love every kind of peg puzzle and wooden puzzle ?
Your child want to explore the sky and discover bird species ?
you have found the right educational game !

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination.

Birds Game for Toddlers : Bird Species Puzzle ! is simple and fun :
* Touch the screen to drag and drop the bird in the right spot.
* Pop all the bubbles and play with the reward screen when a puzzle is solved.
* Tap on the button to pass to the next level.

18 beautiful puzzles in the unlocked version with colorful birds: chicken, duck, goose, hen, pheasant, rooster, turkey, toucan, parrot, penguin, pelican, owl, sparrow, flamingo, vulture, seagull, woodpecker, chick, peacock, eagle, puffin, hawk, ostrich, emu, cassowary, Kiwi bird, cockatoo, wading birds, swallow, dove, hummingbird, capercaillie and many others!

Funny cartoon sound effects and birds chirping !
A stunning collection of migratory birds, water birds, nocturnal birds, birds of prey and fowl with these free puzzles games !
When a puzzle is completed toddlers are rewarded with celebrations and interactions.

Your toddler will have fun with this wooden peg puzzle and beautiful birds.

If your toddler loves to play with puzzles this is the best puzzle game for your child.

Birds Game for Toddlers : Bird Species Puzzle ! is a must have app for little kids. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 0-7 years old
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-a lot of fun with bubbles popping after a puzzle is completed
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-high quality illustrations and amazing birds
-lots of different flying animals
-the best puzzle for toddlers and little kids !

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination!

In this free game for toddlers you can unlock all puzzles and remove the advertising in app.
